author: giffels
body:
Could you pickup the new DBS release 3.1.8b fixing a problem with overwriting the creation date and create_by of files during migration of blocks between two DBS 3 instances, please?

Thanks,
Manuel
title: comp.pre slc5_amd64_gcc461 dbs3 dbs3-client dbs3-migration dbs3-pycurl-client
